### Sample

*Knowledge predication* builds on an 83-languages variety sample.

```{r, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
df <- read.csv("languages.csv", sep=";")
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
map.feature(languages = lang.iso(df$lng),
            features = df$Type,
            label = lang.iso(df$lng),
            popup = lang.iso(df$lng)
            )

```
